value.stringValue: Please be advised the following sample: {!myVariable_current.Name} has been sent.
The stage of {!myVariable_current.Name} has been changed to {!myVariable_current.Status__c}.

Please note your sample {!myVariable_current.Name} will be set to Sample lead dead status as 60 days have passed. Please contact your client for updates or manually set the stage to approved or rejected
